PANTHER Gene Ontology Annotations

Source: R/panther.R
panther.Rd

PANTHER Gene Ontology Annotations

panther(organism, release = NULL)

Arguments

organism

string. Supported organisms:

  • Homo sapiens

  • Mus musculus

  • Caenorhabditis elegans

  • Drosophila melanogaster
release

string or NULL. PANTHER release version. If set NULL, defaults to current release. Consult the PANTHER website for a list of release versions available from the FTP server (e.g. "13.0").

Value

data.frame.

See also

Other Annotation Functions: broadClass, convertGenesToSymbols, convertTranscriptsToGenes, convertUCSCBuildToEnsembl, detectOrganism, eggnog, emptyRanges, geneSynonyms, hgnc2gene, makeGRanges, makeGene2symbol, makeTx2gene, mgi2gene, stripTranscriptVersions

Examples

invisible(capture.output(
    x <- panther("Homo sapiens")
))
#> Downloading PANTHER annotations for Homo sapiens (human)
#> Downloading PTHR13.1_human.gz
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   pantherID = col_character(),
#>   X2 = col_character(),
#>   pantherSubfamily = col_character(),
#>   pantherFamilyName = col_character(),
#>   pantherSubfamilyName = col_character(),
#>   goMF = col_character(),
#>   goBP = col_character(),
#>   goCC = col_character(),
#>   pantherClass = col_character(),
#>   pantherPathway = col_character()
#> )
#> Obtaining HGNC to Ensembl gene ID mappings
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   .default = col_character(),
#>   date_approved_reserved = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_symbol_changed = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_name_changed = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_modified = col_date(format = ""),
#>   entrez_id = col_integer(),
#>   homeodb = col_integer(),
#>   orphanet = col_integer()
#> )
#> See spec(...) for full column specifications.
#> Splitting and sorting the GO terms
#> goMF
#> goBP
#> goCC
#> pantherClass
#> pantherPathway
glimpse(x)
#> Observations: 19,670
#> Variables: 9

#> $ pantherSubfamily     <chr> "PTHR19282:SF169", "PTHR14064:SF3", "PTHR43398...
#> $ pantherFamilyName    <chr> "TETRASPANIN", "CHONDROMODULIN-RELATED", "FAMI...
#> $ pantherSubfamilyName <chr> "TETRASPANIN-6", "TENOMODULIN", "DOLICHOL-PHOS...
#> $ goMF                 <list> [NULL, NULL, <"catalytic activity [GO:0003824...
#> $ goBP                 <list> [<"biological regulation [GO:0065007]", "cell...
#> $ goCC                 <list> [<"cell part [GO:0044464]", "integral to memb...
#> $ pantherClass         <list> [NULL, NULL, <"glycosyltransferase [PC00111]"...
#> $ pantherPathway       <list> [NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, "Parkinson dis...
